3.eng-name: The Book Of The Prayer For Rain (Kitab al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) prayed at solar eclipse; he recited from the Qur'an and then bowed; then he recited from the Qur'an and then bowed; he then recited from the Qur'an and bowed; he then recited fromt eh Qur'an and bowed. Then he prostrated himself and performed the second rak'ah similar to the first

chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That It Should Be Prayed With Four Rak'ahs
